latest_revision.text:
Wood/plastic:

*100-watt laser cutter (CO2, 4x3 bed, DXF or B&W BMP format)
*Ultimaker 3D printer
*Drill press
*Various Hand and power tools
*Miter SawPlaner
*Miter Saw
*Scroll Saw
*Table Saw
*Band Saw
*Disc Sander
*Belt Sander


Metal:
*Mini-lathe, full Lathe
*Mini-mill, Manual Mill
*CNC Mill
*Metal-cutting bandsaw
*Bench grinders
*MIG/TIG Welder with ventilation
*Metal Bandsaw 
*Baileigh 3-IN-1 COMBINATION SHEAR, BRAKE, ROLL, MODEL: SBR-3020 ([https://drive.google.com/file/d/1n_LCEsiJEPVAqdnuPsVulPAjYXe4veoF/view manual])
* Shop Fox Model M1040 & M1041 Plate Shear ([https://drive.google.com/file/d/1tyNzDp1d4PL0ICgZluujFoU5zJbdLD3i/view manual])


Electronics, communication, telecom & security:
*PCB Etching
*Arduino and TONS of shields and sensors
*Soldering, hot air, and desoldering station
*Test equipment including waveform generators, AC and DC supplies, oscilloscopes, etc.


MISC
*Laptops, testing network/servers, wifi, Internet access
*HAM radio station
*Drum, guitars, amps, synths, keyboards
